category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WSOM_find_list_separator
preference.preference_description: Defines the character used to separate multiple entries for queries.No setting for this preference disables multiple entries.If your search criteria includes a semicolon (;) as part of the search value, change the default value of this preference to another value, for example a comma (,) or a pipe (|) character. Otherwise, your search results in incorrect results. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a valid value.
